sentence: ذَهَبَ حَامِدٌ إِلَى الْمَدْرَسَةِ يَوْمَ السَّبْتِ فَوَجَدَ أَنَّ صَدِيقَهُ حُسَيْنَا مَا حَضَرَ فِي الْمَدْرَسَةِ,
meaning: Hamid went to school on Saturday and found that his friend Hussain was not present at school.

sentence: فَسَأَلَ أَخَاهُ عَلِيًّا عَنِ السَّبَبِ,
meaning: So he asked his brother Ali about the reason.

sentence: فَقَالَ: إِنَّهُ مَحْمُومٌ مِنْ يَوْمِ الْخَمِيسِ,
meaning: He (Ali) said: "He has been feverish since Thursday."

sentence: فَعَزَمَ حَامِدٌ عَلَى أَنْ يَعُودَهُ فِي الرُّجُوعِ مِنَ الْمَدْرَسَةِ.
meaning: So Hamid decided to visit him on his way back from school.

sentence: ذَهَبَ حَامِد إِلى بَيْتِ حُسَيْنٍ فَسَلَّمَ وَاسْتَأْذَنَ,
meaning: Hamid went to Hussain's house, greeted them, and asked for permission to enter.

sentence: فَخَرَجَ أَبُو حُسَينٍ,
meaning: Hussain's father came out.

words.meaning: He went out, he came out

sentence: قَالَ حَامِدٌ: إِنِّي أُرِيدُ أَنْ أَعُودَ صَدِيقِي حُسَيْنَا فَقَدْ أَخْبَرَنِي عَلِيٌّ أَنَّهُ مَرِيضٌ,
meaning: Hamid said: "I want to visit my friend Hussain, for Ali informed me that he is sick."

sentence: قَالَ أَبُوهُ: نَعَمْ إِنَّهُ أَصَابَتْهُ الْحُمَّى يَوْمَ الْخَمِيسِ وَيُمْكِنُكَ أَنْ تَعُودَهُ.
meaning: His father said: "Yes, he was struck by fever on Thursday, and you may visit him."

words.meaning: It struck him, it affected him
You can, it is possible for you

sentence: دَخَلَ حَامِدٌ غُرْفَةَ حُسَيْنٍ, فَرَأَى حُسَيْنَا مُضْطَجِعًا,
meaning: Hamid entered Hussain's room and saw Hussain lying down.

sentence: فَسَلَّمَ عَلَيْهِ بِلُطْفٍ, وَدَنَا مِنْهُ, وَقَالَ لَهُ: كَيْفَ حَالُكَ يَا أَخِي؟ عَافَاكَ الله !
meaning: He greeted him kindly, approached him, and said to him: "How are you, my brother? May Allah grant you health!"

sentence: Sentence 1: قَالَ حُسَيْنٌ : قَدْ أَصَابَتْنِي الْحُمَّى يَوْمَ الْخَمِيسِ,
meaning: Hussain said: "The fever struck me on Thursday."

words.meaning: It struck me, it affected me

sentence: وَصَارَتْ شَدِيدَةً يَوْمَ الجُمُعَةِ,
meaning: And it became severe on Friday.

sentence: وَخَفَّتْ فِي اللَّيْلِ,
meaning: And it lessened during the night.

words.meaning: It lessened, it became lighter, it subsided

sentence: وَلَكِنِّي أَشْكُو الصُّدَاءَ بَعْدَ
meaning: But I am suffering from a headache still.

sentence: وَالدُّوَارَ
meaning: And dizziness.

sentence: وَقَدْ ضَعُفَتْ كَثِيرًا
meaning: And I have become very weak.

sentence: كَانّي مَرِيضٌ مُنْذُ أَيَّامٍ,
meaning: As if I have been sick for many days.

sentence: وَلَا أَشْتَهِي الطَّعَامَ.
meaning: And I have no appetite for food.

words.meaning: I desire, I have an appetite for

sentence: قَالَ حَامِدٌ: لاَ بَأْسَ طَهُورٌ إِنْ شَاءَ اللَّهُ,
meaning: Hamid said: "No problem, it will be a purification, God willing."

words.meaning: No problem, it's okay, don't worry

sentence: وَهَلْ عَادَكَ طَبِيبٌ؟
meaning: And has a doctor visited you?

sentence: قَالَ حُسَيْنٌ: نَعَمْ قَدْ عَادَنِي طَبِيبٌ أَمْسِ, وَمَوْعِدُهُ الآنَ.
meaning: Hussain said: "Yes, a doctor visited me yesterday, and his appointment is now."

sentence: وَلَمْ يَجْلِسٍ حَامِدٌ إِلا قَلِيلاً; حَتَّى حَضَرَ الطَّبِيبُ
meaning: Hamid did not sit but for a little while; until the doctor arrived.

sentence: فَجَسَّ يَدَ حُسَيْنٍ, وَقَاسَ الحَرَارَةَ, وَامْتَحَنَ الصَّدْرَ بِالسَّمَّاعَةِ,
meaning: So he felt Hussain's hand, measured the temperature, and examined the chest with the stethoscope.

sentence: وَأَبْدَى الاِرْتِيَاحَ, وَغَيَّرَ فِي الوَصْفَةِ قَلِيلاً, وَقَالَ: إِنَّهُ بَارِيءٌ بِحَمْدِ اللَّهِ.
meaning: And he expressed satisfaction, changed the prescription slightly, and said: "He is recovering, praise be to God."

sentence: وَأَوْصَى أَبَاهُ بِأَنْ يَجْنِيَ حُسَيْنَا مِنَ الْمَاءِ الْبَارِدِ وَالزَّيْتِ, وَالخُرُوجِ فِي الهَوَاءِ, وَالتَّعَبِ,
meaning: And he advised his father to keep Hussain away from cold water, oil, going out in the open air, and exertion.

sentence: وَأَنْ يَسْقِيَهُ اللَّبَنَ وَمَاءَ الشَّعِيرِ وَعَصِيرَ الْفَوَاكِهِ
meaning: And to give him milk, barley water, and fruit juice to drink.

sentence: وَجَلَسَ حَامِدٌ قَلِيلاً, وَقَالَ: إِنَّ الْعَابِدَ إِذَا أَطَالَ الْجُلُوسَ عِنْدَ الْمَرِيضِ, شَقَّ عَلَيْهِ وَعَلَى أَهْلِ بَيْتِهِ,
meaning: And Hamid sat for a little while and said: "Indeed, when the visitor prolongs his sitting with the sick person, it becomes difficult for him and for the people of his house."

words.meaning: It became difficult, it became burdensome
The people of his house, his family

sentence: فَأَسْتَأْذِنُ وَأَنْصَرِفُ, وَأَعُودُ إِنْ شَاءَ اللهُ غَدًا.
meaning: So I ask for permission to leave, and I will return, God willing, tomorrow."

sentence: Paragraph 1: أَبُو الْحَسَنِ النَّدَوِيُّ عَالِمٌ هِنْدِيٌّ مَشْهُورٌ, وَدَاعِيَةٌ مُفَكِّرٌ وَأَدِيبٌ ,مَرَبِّ, وَهُوَ أَوَّلُ رَئِيسٍ لِرَابِطَةِ الْأَدَبِ الإِسْلَامِيِّ العَالَمِيَّةِ.
meaning: Abu al-Hasan al-Nadwi is a famous Indian scholar, an intellectual caller (to Islam), a writer, an educator, and he is the first president of the World League of Islamic Literature.

sentence: وُلِدَ بقرية تكية بمديرية راي بريلي في ولاية أترا براديش سنة ١٩١٣م.
meaning: He was born in the village of Takia, in the district of Rai Bareli, in the state of Uttar Pradesh, in the year 1913 CE.

sentence: بعد تعلمه القرآن الكريم, تعلّم لغتين الأردية والفارسية.
meaning: After learning the Holy Quran, he learned two languages, Urdu and Persian.

sentence: ثم التحق بندوة العلماء ثم بجامعة لكهنؤ للدراسة العربية وحصل على شهادة فاضل أدب في اللغة العربية وآدابها.
meaning: Then he joined Nadwatul Ulama and then the University of Lucknow to study Arabic, and he obtained the degree of Fazil-e-Adab in Arabic language and literature.

sentence: عُيّن مدرسا في دار العلوم لندوة العلماء عام ١٩٣٤م.
meaning: He was appointed as a teacher at Darul Uloom Nadwatul Ulama in the year 1934 CE.

sentence: له عدة مؤلفات في موضوعات شتى في العلوم الإسلامية وفي الأدب الأردية والأدب العربية معا.
meaning: He has numerous authored works on various subjects in Islamic sciences, in Urdu literature, and in Arabic literature together.

sentence: ومن كتبه سلسلة "قصص النبيين" للأطفال وسلسلة أخرى للأطفال باسم "القراءة الراشدة".
meaning: Among his books are the series "Stories of the Prophets" for children and another series for children called "Al-Qira'a al-Rashida" (The Rightly Guided Reading).

words.meaning: The Rightly Guided Reading, or The Wise Reading

sentence: ومن أهم كتبه "ماذا خسر العالم بانحطاط المسلمين" و"بين الدين والمدنية" و"رجال الفكر والدعوة في الإسلام" و"النبوة والأنبياء في ضوء القرآن" و"المسلمون في الهند" و"السيرة النبوية".
meaning: Among his most important books are "What Did the World Lose by the Decline of Muslims?", "Between Religion and Materialism", "Men of Thought and Call in Islam", "Prophethood and the Prophets in Light of the Quran", "Muslims in India", and "The Biography of the Prophet".

words.meaning: What Did the World Lose by the Decline of Muslims?
Men of Thought and Call in Islam
Prophethood and the Prophets in Light of the Quran

sentence: حاز أبو الحسن الندوي على جائزة الملك فيصل العالمية لخدمة الإسلام عام ۱۹۸۰م.
meaning: Abu al-Hasan al-Nadwi won the King Faisal International Prize for Service to Islam in 1980 CE.

sentence: ومنح الدكتورة الفخرية في الآداب من جامعة كشمير عام ١٩٨١م.
meaning: He was awarded an honorary doctorate in literature from the University of Kashmir in 1981 CE.

words.meaning: He was awarded, he was granted

sentence: انتقل إلى جوار ربه سنة ۱۹۹۹م.
meaning: He passed away (literally: moved to the neighborhood of his Lord) in the year 1999 CE.
